ygData.subject: Re: Is a lvl 5 bard usefull in a group???
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Define useful. :) At L5, I d say a bard is about as much use as anyone in said party. Possibly more useful. I don t think any melee r is particularly great
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 07/99, "Janko S." <janko@...> wrote:
> From: "Janko S." <janko@...>
>
> I recently had a fight about this so can anyone please tell me if a lvl 5
> bard is usefull in a group that contains lvl 5 to lvl 7 characters and if
> not when is it usefull.

Define useful. :)

At L5, I'd say a bard is about as much use as anyone in said party.
Possibly more useful. I don't think any melee'r is particularly great at
that level, and the bard can play the L1 song which should marginally
improve everyone's melee. As well, if it's safe enough, you could play
CoD and do a bit of damage that way as well. That said, why bother
grouping at 5? You can still get decent exp from firebeetles I think, or
spiderlings for sure. (freeport/misty thicket area).

Once the bard hit's 6, there's no question they are a great addition to
a group.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
